Name: Esther
description: Esther is married with 3 children and resides in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She is responsible for providing basic needs and guarding her family from poverty. This gives her enough reason to work hard on her business of selling fish. She also engages in a cocoa business. In the cocoa business, she is challenged when prices fluctuate and she cannot recoup her costs. She desires to acquire more family land for farming. She will use the loan to buy more fish to sell.
